markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2545) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 99 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)

</column>

---

You can see in the darkness as easily as an elemental. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).

**Special** You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
name: Elemental Eyes
